definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: BE careful in reading G. B. Shaw. He often had his tongue in his cheek.
sentences.chinese: 讀肖伯納的作品時得注意，他的文章經常話裏有話。

sentences.english: A strong influence was exercised on Shaw by the Fabian society the English reformist organization.
sentences.chinese: 肖伯納深受一個名爲費邊社的英國改革團體的影響。

sentences.english: I saw a play of Shaw's .
sentences.chinese: 我看了肖伯納的一齣戲劇。

sentences.english: The play was written by Bernard Shaw.
Once a beautiful and dissolute British actress wrote to propose marriage to Bernard Shaw.
sentences.chinese: 英國有位美貌風流的女演員，曾寫信向肖伯納求婚。
